1.post_text: Choose the color of the door that will lead you to a brand new world made of thrills: http://bit.ly/812Superfast_CarConfigurator #Ferrari #812Superfast

comments.message: I had to leave mine at the fire station tonight after duty---could not get it to start the fuel injection has been leaking down on the 82 making for hard starts.  I think I flooded it when pushing down the injection metering cone to prime it.   In the dark and cold with depleted battery i decided tomorrow is another day.   If want boring reliability get a Toyota.  If willing to put up with high maintenance and soso reliability for great driving experience get a Ferrari

3.post_text: Beautifully designed and performant both on track and road. #Ferrari #F12tdf

comments.message: Dino has been an important part of my life since 1965, where the first car with the Dino brand was presented. It was the beautiful racing sports car Dino 166P. I am so fascinated by Dino, that I wrote and published the first and only Danish book about these amazing cars some years ago.
First concept of deeply unstable inside chassis plus 4 wheel steering discussed by me and Ing. Amedeo Felisa in 2011.
With something you can only “pilot” can never own it’s shame they’re always upstaged by more elegant, faster cars that you actually can own the title too
